bs-insertmagic-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of insert magic extension
bs-insertmagic-notoc: Text for hides the table of contents.
bs-insertmagic-forcetoc: Text for forces the table of contents to appear at its normal position.
bs-insertmagic-toc: Text for places a table of contents at the word's current position.
bs-insertmagic-noeditsection: Text for hides the section edit links beside headings.
bs-insertmagic-newsectionlink: Text for adds a link ('+' by default) beside the 'edit' tab for adding a new section on a non-talk page.
bs-insertmagic-nonewsectionlink: Text for removes the link beside the 'edit' tab on pages in talk namespaces.
bs-insertmagic-nogallery: Text for used on a category page, replaces thumbnails in the category view with normal links.
bs-insertmagic-hiddencat: Text for used on a category page, hides the category from the lists of categories in its members and parent categories.
bs-insertmagic-nocontentconvert: Text for on wikis with language variants, don't perform any content language conversion (character and phase) in page display.
bs-insertmagic-notitleconvert: Text for on wikis with language variants, don't perform language conversion on the title.
bs-insertmagic-end: Text for explicitly marks the end of the page, to prevent MediaWiki from removing trailing whitespace.
bs-insertmagic-index: Text for tell search engines to index the page.
bs-insertmagic-noindex: Text for tell search engines not to index the page.
bs-insertmagic-staticredirect: Text for on redirect pages, don't allow MediaWiki to automatically update the link when someone moves a page and checks.
bs-insertmagic-currentday: Text for day of the month (unpadded number).
bs-insertmagic-currentday2: Text for day of the month (zero-padded number).
bs-insertmagic-currentdow: Text for day of the week (unpadded number), 0 (for Sunday) through 6 (for Saturday).
bs-insertmagic-currenttimestamp:
Text for timestamp in format YYYYMMDDHHmmss.
* YYYY present year,
* MM present month,
* DD present day,
* HH present hour,
* mm present minute,
* ss present second
bs-insertmagic-sitename: Text for the wiki's site name.
bs-insertmagic-currentversion: Text for the wiki's MediaWiki version.
bs-insertmagic-contentlanguage: Text for the wiki's default interface language.
bs-insertmagic-pageid: Text for returns the page identifier.
bs-insertmagic-pagesize: Text for [expensive] Returns the byte size of the specified page. Use |R to get raw (unformatted) numbers.
bs-insertmagic-protectionlevel: Text for outputs the protection level for a given action on the current page.
bs-insertmagic-revisionday: Text for day change was made (unpadded number).
bs-insertmagic-revisionday2: Text for day change was made (zero-padded number).
bs-insertmagic-revisionmonth: Text for month change was made (zero-padded number).
bs-insertmagic-revisionmonth1: Text for month change was made (unpadded number).
bs-insertmagic-revisionyear: Text for year change was made.
bs-insertmagic-revisiontimestamp: Text for timestamp as of time of change.
bs-insertmagic-revisionuser: Text for the username of the user who made the most recent change to the page, or the current user when previewing a change.
bs-insertmagic-displaytitle: Text for format the current page's title header.
bs-insertmagic-defaultsort: Text for used for categorizing pages, sets a default category sort key.
bs-insertmagic-gallery: Make a gallery of thumbnails with the <gallery> tag.
bs-insertmagic-noinclude: Text for anything between <noinclude> and </noinclude> will be processed and displayed only when the page is being viewed directly, it will not be included or substituted.
bs-insertmagic-type-switches:
Option in dialog for behavior switches 
 {{Identical|Behavior switches}}
bs-insertmagic-type-quickaccess:
Option in dialog for quick access
 {{Identical|Quick access}}
bs-insertmagic-label-first:
Headline text for 1. choose tag or magic word 
 {{Identical|1. Choose tag or magic word}}
bs-insertmagic-label-second:
Headline text the text area which allows the user to change the code of the tag, which is then to be inserted into the article text.
 {{Identical|2. Modify code}}
bs-insertmagic-label-examples:
Textlabel above the example section in the description field of the insert magic dialog.
{{Identical|Example}}
bs-insertmagic-label-see-also: Textlabel above the see also link for more information in the description field of the insert magic dialog.

Describes the API endpoint that lists all items for the InsertMagic dialog

Describes the API endpoint that lists all items for the InsertMagic dialog
